name: Stu's pirate game
description:
I decided to give Unity a try out for the first time, so this is coming from a c++/sfml & c#/monogame programmer with zero experience in unity.

I haven't really finished this just out of pure laziness really and a GOT/Overwatch Comp addiction. I do plan on taking it more serious in future and adding stuff to it but right now it's not possible.

Just decided to submit what I have. Some notes :

2 To enter boat mode (I'm going to make the pirate ship usable at some point).

Left click - fire

ALT + F4 TO QUIT (NO MENU)

E to Pickup objects / Right and left click to let them go.

Some credits :

Twitterz :

@Tetra for providing the pirateship in AssetForge.

@iGameiDev for making me some crabs for the game.
